Core Blockchain represents a blockchain: Core Blockchain represents a blockchain revolution as the first-ever next-generation Proof of Work, referred to as the Proof of Distributed Efficiency //PoDE//, in the world. Distributed Efficiency refers to transactions being confirmed on a network in any location. Using energy that could be waste energy, grid energy, or any other form of energy production, and or a combination thereof is not only environmentally friendly but also self-sustainable.
